sources.title: Arctic Flight (1952) .
sources.description: Wayne Morris, Lola Albright, Alan Hale Jr

metadata.Plot: Mike Wien, an Alaskan bush pilot operating the the Bering Sea area, makes friends with John W. Wetherby, posing as a wealthy American businessman. But, in reality, he is a Russian spy on his way to Siberia carrying microfilms of U.S. defense installations.
metadata.Writer: George Bricker, Ewing Scott, Robert Hill
metadata.Actors: Wayne Morris, Lola Albright, Alan Hale Jr.
